description: When you're short on time, make this quick, easy and tasty green curry with tuna recipe.
name: Thai Green Tuna Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small can green curry paste (good quality )

recipeInstructions.text: Cut tuna into 2cm chunks slice chilli into small pieces and remove tops and strings from the side of the snow peas set all aside on a plate ready to go.
Heat coconut milk gently in a frying pan on a low heat don't boil.
Add tuna and green curry paste and simmer slowly on a low heat don't not boil (this prevents the tuna from breaking up).
Once tuna is cooked through add fresh snow peas and a squeeze of fresh lime to balance a low to simmer just until the snow peas are tender.
Follow instructions on rice and heat in the microwave or you could just cook some normally I like the mixed brown wild and red rice it gives good nuttiness.
Serve on a plate dressing the curry with freshly sliced chilli coriander leaves and fresh Thai basil.
Cook pappadums I like to do them in the microwave heaps healthier than in oil.
